channel.title: Bronze arrows.. 6K ea?!
channel.description:
[s]I don't know if there's already a topic for this, but check the GE. Bronze arrows are currently priced at 6.2k ea.[/s] [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/3320/63310430.png[/img]
EDIT: The price has been corrected. 18 gp again.

item.title: Bronze arrows.. 6K ea?!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

i ended up still making a large profit on the 10k i purchased to test the “first sale” trick people are buying them 60gp ea on f2p

Read full topic

item.title: Bronze arrows.. 6K ea?!
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Its obviously not a player driven price, so it must be a bug, meaning no-one is actually going to pay that much.

Lots of people walking round trying to sell their 200k bronze arrows for massive profit and wondering why no one is buying.

Read full topic

item.title: Bronze arrows.. 6K ea?!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

anyone have a large amount of bronze arrows creating an account to exploit

When a new account sells its first item on the GE, the item is instantly converted to coins. This doesn't apply if the selling price is outside of the +/- 5% range.

add me in game “arrowwhore” still in tutorial

no longer applies to accounts

Read full topic
